page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: The Priory Church - Present Day On average 150 people go to services in our church every week.The choir has 16 members. There are 5 services a week and about 6 christenings,6 weddings and 6 funerals a year. It costs Â£9,000 a year to run the church, excluding repairs. The Church Council is an elected committee, formed to help with the running and mission of the church. Being formally a priory, it is larger than most churches, and visitors come in their hundreds every year. Their donations help to keep the church going. There are also concerts throughout the year, an during the summer ,choirs from all over the country perform in the week-long Edington festival-one service always being brodcasted on the radio.The present vicar is Rev Maurice Bird.
